name: Allis Chalmers 60 Pull Type Combine
description:
--PC Release!--

Allis Chalmers AC60 pull-type combine.

Sorry it took awhile for this to come out, I spent way to much time trying to fix something that didn't need fixed. Big thanks to the testers and others who helped me with this project.

If you would like to support me, please donate to help provide for model costs! https://paypal.me/schabenmodding

For model funding, head over to my Patreon and make a pledge, it really shows your support: https://www.patreon.com/schabenmodding

Link: https://schaben-modding.itch.io/allis-chalmers-60-pull-type-combine

Enjoy!
